name: Hunter (Beta)
description:
You're a Hunter looking a monster. In the day, set up bait, traps and explore. In the night, use your preparations to hunt the monster, or become the hunted.

Controls

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Cycle through items/Interact

X - Use

Press Z to set up a camp, this will allow you to start setting up.

Press Z on the campfire to go straight to night.

Hold Space to use your map.

Changes: 

Day and night cycle has been implemented. Day lasts 6 minutes whilst night lasts 3 minutes.

The monster has a proper set of sprites and new behaviours.

New map system has been implemented which will help with exploring.
